resources.string:
👋 Hey! **I'm your friendly TutorTalk, powered by Gemini Pro!** 🚀 

Feel free to ask me anything about your course, dive into the functions, or explore the amazing features available. Whether it's information, assistance or just a friendly chat, **I'm here to help!** 🌐💬
Are you sure you want to delete all chats?
Are you sure you want to delete this chat? This will delete corresponding chat request or response.
